## Constitution Compliance (if applicable)

<!-- Include this section when generating pre-release or code review checklists -->

**Principle I - Desktop-First Experience**:
- [ ] CHK101 Feature works offline without network dependency
- [ ] CHK102 Uses native Electron APIs appropriately
- [ ] CHK103 State persists correctly across app restarts

**Principle II - Git Worktree Isolation**:
- [ ] CHK201 Worktree isolation not bypassed
- [ ] CHK202 Worktree cleanup verified on chat deletion
- [ ] CHK203 Error handling tested for worktree creation failures

**Principle III - Type Safety**:
- [ ] CHK301 All tRPC routers have Zod validation
- [ ] CHK302 Database migrations generated and applied
- [ ] CHK303 No `any` types without justification comment
- [ ] CHK304 TypeScript compilation passes with strict mode

**Principle IV - User Transparency**:
- [ ] CHK401 Tool executions visible in real-time UI
- [ ] CHK402 Diff previews shown before changes applied
- [ ] CHK403 Error messages include actionable recovery steps
- [ ] CHK404 Background operations show progress indicators

**Principle V - Performance**:
- [ ] CHK501 No blocking operations >100ms on main thread
- [ ] CHK502 Large file operations use streaming
- [ ] CHK503 Database queries optimized with proper indexes
- [ ] CHK504 React components memoized where appropriate
